data.trans_hint: Người cho vay thế chấp lo sợ về khả năng thanh toán của công ty.
data.en_hint: The mortgage lender was apprehensive about the company's ability to pay.
data.content_game_1: The mortgage lender was apprehensive about the company's ability to pay.
data.answer_en_hint: The mortgage lender was apprehensive about the company's ability to pay.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy nên cố gắng trở nên quyết đoán hơn.
data.en_hint: She should try to be more assertive.
data.content_game_1: She should try to be more assertive.
data.answer_en_hint: She should try to be more assertive.

data.trans: Hay hoài nghi (không tin người khác làm vì mục đích tốt hoặc tin vào điều tốt sẽ xảy đến)
data.trans_hint: Với ánh nhìn đầy hoài nghi đó, anh ta không tin cái cả đâu.
data.en_hint: With that cynical outlook, he doesn't trust anyone.
data.content_game_1: With that cynical outlook, he doesn't trust anyone.
data.answer_en_hint: With that cynical outlook, he doesn't trust anyone.

data.trans: Lập dị, kỳ cục, quái gở
data.trans_hint: Hành vi lập dị của anh ta đã khiến anh ta mất việc.
data.en_hint: His eccentric behavior made him lose his job.
data.content_game_1: His eccentric behavior made him lose his job.
data.answer_en_hint: His eccentric behavior made him lose his job.

data.trans: Ta đây, tự cao tự đại
data.trans_hint: Trái ngược với cô, em gái cô lại kiêu ngạo, ích kỷ và tự cao tự đại.
data.en_hint: By contrast, her sister was vain, selfish and egoistic.
data.content_game_1: By contrast, her sister was vain, selfish and egoistic.
data.answer_en_hint: By contrast, her sister was vain, selfish and egoistic.

data.trans: Lý tưởng hóa ai, cái gì
data.trans_hint: Xã hội tiếp tục lý tưởng hóa gia đình đủ cả cha lẫn mẹ.
data.en_hint: Society continues to idealize the two-parent family.
data.content_game_1: Society continues to idealize the two-parent family.
data.answer_en_hint: Society continues to idealize the two-parent family.

data.trans: Không chu đáo, thiếu chu đáo
data.trans_hint: Thật là thiếu chu đáo khi bạn không gọi lại cho anh ấy.
data.en_hint: It was inconsiderate of you not to call him again.
data.content_game_1: It was inconsiderate of you not to call him again.
data.answer_en_hint: It was inconsiderate of you not to call him again.

data.trans: Do dự, lưỡng lự, thiếu quyết đoán
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy quá thiếu quyết đoán để trở thành một nhà lãnh đạo giỏi.
data.en_hint: He's too indecisive to make a good leader.
data.content_game_1: He's too indecisive to make a good leader.
data.answer_en_hint: He's too indecisive to make a good leader.

data.trans_hint: Anh cố gắng tìm ra một cách khéo léo để nói cho cô ấy biết sự thật.
data.en_hint: He tried to find a tactful way of telling her the truth.
data.content_game_1: He tried to find a tactful way of telling her the truth.
data.answer_en_hint: He tried to find a tactful way of telling her the truth.

data.trans_hint: Quảng cáo nhắm đến những phụ nữ trẻ cả tin lo lắng về cân nặng của mình.
data.en_hint: The advertisement is aimed at gullible young women worried about their weight.
data.content_game_1: The advertisement is aimed at gullible young women worried about their weight.
data.answer_en_hint: The advertisement is aimed at gullible young women worried about their weight.
